title: Southwest of Salem: The Story of the San Antonio Four
brief_description: In 1994, four women were accused tried, and convicted of the heinous sexual assault of two young girls. Twenty years later, the four women have maintained their innocence, insisting that the accusations were entirely fabricated, and born of homophobic prejudice and a late-90s Satanic Panic.

constellations_other.name: Presumption of guilt
constellations_other.description: A Constellation looking at true crime documentaries, the nature of innocence and prejudice.
